name: Ego Wars Free . Iron SpaceShip Combat Simulator
name_original: Ego Wars Free . Iron SpaceShip Combat Simulator
description:
Play now in an amazing space battle simulator!

Are you an authentic Jedi? Let your inner hero shine and be part of your favorite movie saga!

As The Force Awakens in the sky, your mission is to save humanity from the rival empire in an environment of planets, meteorites and comets!

Your challenge will be to get the best scores among the many players who will fight in this airplane combat.

This is the time to enjoy a video game that simulates the war between galaxies!

Can you handle the space crafts better than anyone in the universe?

Follow us on Twitter: @Oscarminigames
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
